languages.text: {n}Офицеры молча переглядываются. Почтение к вам — или, быть может, страх — останавливает их от выражения какого-либо недовольства.{/n}
{n}The officers look at each other in silence. Their respect for you — or perhaps their fear of you — stops them from expressing any displeasure.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Офицеры молча переглядываются. Почтение к вам — или, быть может, страх — останавливает их от выражения какого-либо недовольства.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The officers look at each other in silence. Their respect for you — or perhaps their fear of you — stops them from expressing any displeasure.{/n}
{n}The officers look at each other in silence. Their respect for you — or perhaps their fear of you — stops them from expressing any displeasure.{/n}
{n}The officers look at each other in silence. Their respect for you — or perhaps their fear of you — stops them from expressing any displeasure.{/n}
{n}The officers look at each other in silence. Their respect for you — or perhaps their fear of you — stops them from expressing any displeasure.{/n}
{n}The officers look at each other in silence. Their respect for you — or perhaps their fear of you — stops them from expressing any displeasure.{/n}

languages.text: {n}士官たちは互いに視線を交わした。あなたに対する敬意…あるいは恐れが、不満を口にするのを押しとどめていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officers look at each other in silence. Their respect for you — or perhaps their fear of you — stops them from expressing any displeasure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}士官たちは互いに視線を交わした。あなたに対する敬意…あるいは恐れが、不満を口にするのを押しとどめていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Subaylar, sessizlik içinde birbirlerine bakıyor. Sana karşı saygılarından, hatta belki de korkularından ötürü olsa gerek ki hiçbir rahatsızlık emaresi göstermiyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officers look at each other in silence. Their respect for you — or perhaps their fear of you — stops them from expressing any displeasure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Subaylar, sessizlik içinde birbirlerine bakarlar. Sana karşı saygılarından, hatta belki de korkularından ötürü olsa gerek ki hiçbir rahatsızlık emaresi göstermezler.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los oficiales se miran en silencio. Su respeto hacia ti, o posiblemente su temor, les impide expresar su insatisfacción con la situación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officers look at each other in silence. Their respect for you — or perhaps their fear of you — stops them from expressing any displeasure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los oficiales se miran en silencio. Su respeto hacia ti, o posiblemente su temor, les impide expresar su insatisfacción con la situación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}三位军官沉默下来，面面相觑。他们没有表达任何不满，或许是出于对你的尊重，也或许是由于对你的恐惧。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officers look at each other in silence. Their respect for you — or perhaps their fear of you — stops them from expressing any displeasure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}三位军官沉默下来，面面相觑。他们没有表达任何不满，或许是出于对你的尊重，也或许是由于对你的恐惧。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les officiers se cherchent du regard, silencieusement. Ils ne manifestent pas le moindre mécontentement, mais est-ce par respect ou par peur ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officers look at each other in silence. Their respect for you — or perhaps their fear of you — stops them from expressing any displeasure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les officiers se cherchent du regard, silencieusement. Ils ne manifestent pas le moindre mécontentement, mais est-ce par respect ou par peur ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Offiziere blicken sich schweigend an. Aus Respekt vor dir – oder möglicherweise aus Angst – lassen sie sich ihren Missmut nicht anmerken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officers look at each other in silence. Their respect for you — or perhaps their fear of you — stops them from expressing any displeasure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Offiziere blicken sich schweigend an. Aus Respekt vor dir – oder möglicherweise aus Angst – lassen sie sich ihren Missmut nicht anmerken.{/n}
